name: morpho-vaults-ops
description: Debugging and utility scripts for Morpho Vaults (deployment handled by Forge)

scriptshelp.ops:build:oracle: Builds an oracle using Morpho's ChainlinkOracleV2Factory (alternative to self-deployed).
scriptshelp.ops:extract:oracle: Extracts oracle address from Morpho factory deployment.
scriptshelp.ops:extract:addresses: Extracts all contract addresses from Forge deployment artifacts.
scriptshelp.test:morpho-sdk: Tests Morpho Blue SDK functionality on Sepolia and compares with manual RPC calls.
scriptshelp.debug: Run debugging scripts from temp/ directory for on-chain analysis.
